To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private LongLineCandle _longlinecandle;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_longlinecandle = LongLineCandle(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_longlinecandle.IsReady)
{
    var period = _longlinecandle.Period.Value;
    var current = _longlinecandle.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.longlinecandle = self.LongLineCandle(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.longlinecandle.IsReady:
    period = self.longlinecandle.Period.Value
    current = self.longlinecandle.Current.Value
